page.title: 01Saturday Activies
page.content:
On Saturday we get up around 8.30am. My dad takes my sister to the Golf Club. Mum and I tidy the house, wash and iron. Sometimes I go into town with my friends. When I get back I do about an hour's piano practice. By this time Melanie and dad are back and we all sit down to dinner.
On Saturday I don't have to go to school, so I lie in bed until 11.00am. I get up and get dressed in jeans and a jumper. I tidy my room, have a wash and go downstairs. For breakfast I have Shreddies or Rice Krispies. I play outside with my sister. We roller scate around the Block. I have lunch of beans on toast, sandwiches or cheese on toast. After lunch, I call for my friends and we go to the meadows. We play on the swings. Then we go back to my house to listen to
